abstract: Jonathan McIntosh, man arrested in central Arkansas, frees his hands while handcuffed in back of police squad car and opens fire on officers with gun he had hidden on his body; officers return fire, killing McIntosh.
lead_paragraph: A handcuffed parolee who had been frisked for a weapon opened fire on law enforcement officers from the back of a patrol car in central Arkansas, provoking a return of gunfire that left him dead.

headline.main: Arkansas: Handcuffed Man Is Killed in Squad Car Shootout
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Handcuffed Man Is Killed in Squad Car Shootout

snippet: A handcuffed parolee who had been frisked for a weapon opened fire on law enforcement officers from the back of a patrol car in central Arkansas, provoking a return of gunfire that left him dead.
